description: Granuloma Annulare is a chronic skin condition characterized by raised, reddish or skin-colored bumps that form a ring pattern.
possible causes: The exact cause of Granuloma Annulare is unknown, but it is believed to be related to immune system dysfunction or skin trauma.
symptoms: Circular or ring-shaped bumps on the skin
Itching or irritation at the site of the bumps
treatments: Cryotherapy to freeze and remove the bumps
Light therapy to help improve skin appearance
